alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN CLINTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 221 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Waynesville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Funnel clouds have been observed with this storm. Locations impacted include... Port William, Paintersville, Lumberton, Middleton Corner, Kingman and Interstate 71 at US Route 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
